title: How to Make Barbecued Coleslaw

steps.headline: Gather your ingredients, prepare your sauce (if desired) and heat up the BBQ plate.
steps.description: Its quick to make so its good to cook with other things being barbecued rather than cooking it on its own.

steps.headline: Add the oil and when hot, add the vegetables and any optional extra ingredients (except any sauces) and stir fry briskly until just tender.
Transfer to a serving dish, add the sauce and stir through.
steps.description: Adding sauces straight to a hotplate can make it burn and taste bad, as well as making the plate much harder to clean afterwards.

text: Gather your ingredients, prepare your sauce (if desired) and heat up the BBQ plate. Its quick to make so its good to cook with other things being barbecued rather than cooking it on its own. Add the oil and when hot, add the vegetables and any optional extra ingredients (except any sauces) and stir fry briskly until just tender. This is typically 1-2 minutes Transfer to a serving dish, add the sauce and stir through. Adding sauces straight to a hotplate can make it burn and taste bad, as well as making the plate much harder to clean afterwards. Serve right away.
